summary.span: 表示當使用 活動引發事件時所傳送的資料。

span.span: Represents the data sent when an event is raised using the activity.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何從衍生類別的建構函式呼叫基底 建構函式。The following example shows how to call the base constructor from a derived class' constructor. 這個範例來自＜訂購狀態機器 SDK＞範例。This example is from the Ordering State Machine SDK sample. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[訂購狀態機器範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59272cf4-bc98-439c-bcfa-b66999ebce5c)。For more information, see [Ordering State Machine Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59272cf4-bc98-439c-bcfa-b66999ebce5c). MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Identity { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定引發事件的使用者身分識別。

span.span: Gets or sets the identity of the user that raised the event.

value.span: 引發事件的使用者身分識別。

span.span: The identity of the user that is raising the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性是由 活動評估。This property is evaluated by the activity. 如果在這個活動的 屬性中所設定的值，不符合任何與使用者身分識別相關聯的角色，則不允許執行該活動。If the value that is set in the property of this activity does not match any of the roles associated with the user identity, the activity is not allowed to execute. 引發事件的實體可以是人員或電腦。The entity that raises the event can be a person or a computer. 角色功能會使用識別，以確定這個身分識別能夠將資料發送到這個工作流程。Identity is used by the Roles functionality to ensure that this identity is allowed to submit data to this workflow.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Guid InstanceId { Guid get(); void set(Guid value); };

span.span: The workflow instance identifier for the workflow instance that contains the that is expected to handle the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是必要的屬性。This is a required property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool WaitForIdle { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否應立即引發事件，或在引發事件之前是否應將工作流程閒置。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the event should be raised immediately, or if the workflow should go idle before raising the event.

value.span: 如果工作流程應該在引發此事件之前處於閒置狀態，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the workflow should go idle before raising the event; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值是 `false`。The default value is `false`. `true` 的值指出資料已使用 送到工作流程。A value of `true` indicates that data was submitted to the workflow using . `false` 的值指出資料已使用 送到工作流程。A value of `false` indicates that data was submitted to the workflow using .
